name: FHIM_ImmunizationRefusalReason
title: Immunization Refusal Reason Excluding Nulls
description: Causes specified for refusing vaccination, combined with roles of those deciding to refuse it. This value set includes all the codes from PHVS_SubstanceRefusalReason_IIS (2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.3380) except Other. Published
